thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Orange Belgium Q1 Adjusted Ebitda Down At 60.6 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orange Belgium Q1 Adjusted Ebitda Down At 60.6 Million Euros
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - ORANGE BELGIUM SA:
* REG-ORANGE BELGIUM : FINANCIAL INFORMATION FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018
* Q1 2018: REVENUES +0.9 % , RETAIL SERVICE REVENUES +6.2 % , ADJUSTED. EBITDA -11.5 % YOY
* 2018 GUIDANCE REITERATED * 19 THOUSAND NEW LOVE CABLE CUSTOMERS JOINED ORANGE BELGIUMâ€™S CONVERGENT CUSTOMER BASE IN Q1 OF 2018
* Q1 ADJUSTED EBITDA EUR 60.6 MILLION VERSUS EUR 68.5 MILLION YEAR AGO
* TOTAL CONVERGENT CUSTOMER BASE AT 122 THOUSAND AT END Q1 * CONVERGENT MOBILE CUSTOMER BASE INCREASED BY 30 THOUSAND TO 186 THOUSAND IN Q1 OF 2018
* ORGANIC CASH FLOW AMOUNTED TO 19.9 MILLION EUROS IN Q1 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
